channel.title: Background help
channel.description: Okay i made my Jframe bigger but i wanna make my client background fit my Jframe but it wont my client background will only go to i think its 745X503 what file or whatever do i go in so i can make my background fit the Jframe?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2009, 09:09:15 pm[/size][hr]Wow really no-body can help me?

item.title: Background help
item.dc:creator: @baby_kid13 baby_kid13
item.description:
@baby_kid13 wrote:

Statik97:

What id o mate is go to the pic, right click it, then pick open with paint (if u got paint) and just drag the corners and resize it. Then hit save…

No see look i made the Jframe bigger but when i try to post a bigger picture to fit the Jframe it only shows 745X503 of the picture cuz something is stoping it from being bigger

Read full topic
